attributes.comment:
Adoptive parent - Jennifer Raposo
Please reconsider the magnitude to which the adoption-related fees are proposed
to increase. Many adoptive parents are barely able to scrape together the costs
to realize their dream of being a parent. The increase in fees will increase costs to
a process that already costs thousands of dollars! I have spent almost $45,000 to
adopt my daughter internationally and may now have to pay almost $400 to get a
new Certificate of Citizenship due to a name change! I already felt the current fee
of $220 was awfully expensive just to get a new form with a different name...now to
have to pay $380 is criminal and I have NO choice....it is an important document
my daughter must have! To those making the ultimate decision - consider how
you would feel if you were in the shoes of we law abiding, tax paying, adoptive
parents! I submit you may feel similarly outraged and on the very short end of the
stick!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jennifer Raposo
